entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:41 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 9.2°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
